website_summaries.verdict: JBL's Live 200BT wireless headphones deliver strong bass response and sculpted, bright highs in a cool, easy to operate design for a relatively affordable price.
pros: Sculpted but balanced bass and treble

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Considering these are JBL speakers the sound quality is not good. Tinny sound, empty of bass and poor mid range. Talk-time is good. These are not retractable buds, however, the cords are heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great to lift/not so much to run
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to run in and they bounce a lot and kept pulling out of my ear, to lift with they're great, my husband uses them when hes working, this way he won't lose them. The sound quality was great, the fit was great, only reason I give a 4 star is due to them bouncing around while I was running.
customer_reviews.author: Jenne Voelker

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the sound. The price was nice. Only one problem. I wear these at work and move around a lot. I find they don't hang evenly around my neck. The right side rides up and around my neck. If you are less active they would probably stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel good but the volume on the right goes down on its own
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty light but the volume keeps going down on just the right side , and the quality is the quality of a pair of $15 ones . They work good for calls but I don’t know if this came defective
customer_reviews.author: mauricio alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Simple, cheap, doesn't fall off, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this headphone set because it stays on, the soft ear buds stay in, its easy to use once you get some practice, it keeps a charge, and its cheap. I don't need super sound quality because I'm listening to books and podcasts, mostly. I haven't tried it with music. But the sound quality is fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is good and clear. bluetooth connection is quick and easy everytime. good price. only somewhat dislike is the flimsy neckband, doesnt sit well around neck
customer_reviews.author: kilo

customer_reviews.title: Good Bluetooth head buds for the price
customer_reviews.text: I sleep with earbuds/head phones. These don't hurt the ears and stay in place. They are used mostly for podcasts, so I don't have much opinion on music sound or noise cancelling. They work and were a fair price. I would recommend them to anyone wanting a similar use.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Morris

customer_reviews.title: Pairing is not that easy
customer_reviews.text: They are great when they work. I often have to pair and unpair the headphone multiple times to get them to work with my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended due to sound quality
customer_reviews.text: They feel and for great easy to use. But the sounds quality is not good the trebble and mid rang is scratchy not a clear or crisp sound
customer_reviews.author: Isis holcombe

customer_reviews.title: Tinny Sound
customer_reviews.text: These hurt my ears and had a “tinny” sound. I bought them because they were supposed to be good for small ears. I used the smallest size and they fit in ok but the sound was awful.
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones for the price! I have small ears and it’s Easily falls out of my ears unfortunately. Sound is ok, but I have high standards and I found better headphones working better for me. Overall it’s good though.
customer_reviews.author: Judit

customer_reviews.title: Not made very well
customer_reviews.text: Falls off non-stop. Wont stay around neck. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Angelic

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great! I wouldn't recommend this for workout purposes. Due to the fact it just bounces around. Other wise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: Gd product for $
customer_reviews.text: Like to use it at work. Nice t9 listen to music with and can have one ear open tto hear as well.
customer_reviews.author: David Reeve

customer_reviews.title: Multi connection use
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones phones because the battery life is amazing and the multi connections use
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Found a scratch in this product. Wondering this one is new or not
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Kumar Govindasamy

customer_reviews.title: Annoying play/stop button.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaint with the sound quality for both audio and phone calls, however the stop and play button has got to be in the worst place possible. Every time I move my head or right shoulder the button gets bumped and it turns off or on, which I find highly annoying. I drove semi truck every day and Rely On this device heavily and this “feature” means I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Smith

product_meta.title: JBL Live 200BT Wireless in-Ear Neckband Headphones (Black)
product_meta.description: Make the most out of every moment and keep in touch with your world in style with these JBL Live 200BT Wireless In-Ear Neckband Headphones. Delivering JBL Signature Sound with wireless streaming along with a flexible neckband, these in-ear headphones allow you to connect in comfort while on the go. Stream your playlists for up to 10 hours and then fully recharge the battery in just 2 hours. Easily control music, phone calls and access your voice assistant with the three-button remote control and microphone.Punchy Bass PerformanceThe legendary JBL Signature Sound as found at concerts, in the studio and in the home is now available in a headphone. These wireless headphones feature 8mm drivers with punchy bass performance to enjoy great sound. With Bluetooth technology you can wirelessly stream music from smartphones, tablets and televisions. You can effortlessly switch from listening to music on your portable device to take a call from your phone.For Comfort and On-The-Go ConvenienceCrafted with premium materials, these headphones come with a 3-button remote, microphone and multi-point connection capabilities for seamless switching between devices. To further elevate your comfort and on-the-go convenience, you will enjoy their magnetic buds for tangle-free use as well as the soft touch ear-tips included in multiple sizes. Designed to flow naturally with the contours of your head and neck, the headphones rest securely and comfortably even throughout the longest playlists.
feature_bullets: 10-HOUR BATTERY LIFE AND 2-HOUR RECHARGING TIME: Enjoy long-lasting fun and fast recharging thanks to best in class 10 hours of play time and 2-hour quick charge

BLUETOOTH TECHNOLOGY: Wireless sound streaming from smartphones, tablets and televisions. Effortlessly switch from listening to music on your portable device to a call from your phone, so that you never miss a call
HANDS-FREE CALLS WITH VOICE ASSISTANT: Easily control music, phone calls and access your voice assistant with the one-button remote control and microphone
ALL-DAY COMFORT NECKBAND: Designed to flow naturally with the contours of your head and neck, the headphones rest securely and comfortably even throughout the longest playlists
JBL AUTHORIZED DEALER: Includes USA Manufacturer Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars43 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
